title: Advanced English 505
headline: This free online English course explains grammar rules and provides vocabulary related to life events and storytelling.
description: This course teaches English students valuable words and phrases related to life events that tell the story of their lives as they include narrative transition words. We explain how to use such terms to help you decide when and how to use past tenses, perfect modals, and narrative tenses. This course is ideal for those who wish to improve their English grammar, vocabulary, and pronunciation while learning how to tell a good story.
courseDescription:
This English course explains important grammatical rules while expanding your vocabulary and polishing your English skills. In the first part of the course, we review new words related to significant events that you might use to tell the story of someone's life. We then show you how to use different narrative transitional words to connect a story's beginning, middle, and end.

The course then moves on to grammar and discusses the four past tenses: simple, continuous, perfect, and perfect continuous. We explain how to use them to describe simultaneous and sequential actions. This part of the course explores various subjects, including the perfect modals and narrative tenses used to tell stories or describe past events.

The course's final section aims to enhance your English reading, speaking, and writing abilities. We revise the words you might include in a story about someone's life and consider narrative transition words. Our 'Student Practice' section provides articles, videos, and audio clips to help you practice your newfound skills as you expand your vocabulary, while the 'Resources' section provides a writing exercise to help you gauge your progress. Learn new words you can use to tell a good story and connect with your audience. Sign up to improve your English with this exciting course.
